directions: Combine black-eyed peas, tomato, lemon juice, onion, cilantro, oil, oregano, salt, garlic, and black pepper in a bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until flavors are blended, at least 2 hours.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can black-eyed peas, drained and rinsed
¾ teaspoon salt, or to taste
title: Vegan Black Eyed Pea Salad with Cilantro
